title: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. In the "Export" dialog window, select both projects created earlier.
2. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip) and begin export to zip file.
OB:
When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up with the following details:
- The file of the same name in project 2 is listed as the problem. (i.e., foo.txt in project 2).
- If you name foo.txt in project 2 foo2.txt, there are no problems.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
SR:
1. Create two projects with files that have the same name under different directories.
2. Open the "Export" dialog window.
3. Select both projects.
4. Provide a name for the zip file.
5. Click on the "Export" button to export the projects to a zip file.
6. Verify that no error message is displayed and the zip file contains all the files with the same name under different directories.
